short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unicorny Gmail. Gmail Simplified with minimalist, clean UX, inspired by Google Inbox. Plus a touch of Unicorny. :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unicorny Gmail. Gmail Simplified with minimalist, clean UX, inspired by Google Inbox. Plus a touch of Unicorny. :) See my blog post from March 2019, detailing my frustration with Gmail and the demise of Google Inbox.

The original CSS was applied with Chrome Extension UserCSS, though I then packaged just the CSS relevant to Gmail as a standalone Chrome Extension.

See my original blog post on this project here!
https://medium.com/@airshipcms/gmail-ux-sucks-so-i-fixed-it-for-my-own-sanity-b6f33898ebe3

Updated Nov 6, 2019. Google updated the interface and Ads are showing again. This update hides ads again.
